long_description: The Nalgene Multipurpose Vial kit features break-resistant containers that organize small essentials, such as matches, pills, cottonballs, fishing sinkers and more. Multisize polyethylene vials come packed in a reusable 5 x 8 in. zipper-lock bag. Top rack dishwasher safe. Nalgene Multipurpose Vial kit is not recommended for storing liquids.
short_description: The Nalgene Multipurpose Vial kit features break-resistant containers that organize small essentials, such as matches, pills, cottonballs, fishing sinkers and more.
